I find it to be a really fun and fulfilling game sometimes. There are tons of hackers though, and you should get prime to minimize those hopefully. The best thing about this game is the constant urge to improve and rank up. And the fact that with time and dedication, that will eventually happen. You will become better. And thats honestly the part that I find addicting. I actually mostly play Valorant, but its a similar game, grindwise.
